statements: DELETE FROM AR_Experience_Logs WHERE log_id = 10 AND user_id = 25;
DELETE FROM AR_Experience_Logs WHERE log_date < '2021-08-15' AND ar_experience LIKE '%virtual%'
DELETE FROM error_reporting WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp <= '2022-07-01';
DELETE FROM ar_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM error_reporting_data WHERE error_id = 100 AND log_id = 500;
DELETE FROM ar_experience_logs WHERE user_id = 200 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM ErrorReports WHERE error_code = 404 AND reported_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM troubleshooting_data WHERE reported_by = 'Admin' AND report_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
